metadata.title: CVE-2018-17097 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The WavFileBase class in WavFile.cpp in Olli Parviainen SoundTouch 2.0allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double free) orpossibly have unspecified other impact, as demonstrated by SoundStretch.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17097` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsoundtouch1 - 1.9.2-2+deb9u1ubuntu0.1~esm1
soundstretch - 1.9.2-2+deb9u1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: soundtouch package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-2+deb9u1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
